strIntroduction: One of the must-see shows in Korea, Nanta show combines Korean instrument which can break down national boundaries. Regardless of language and age, everyone will definitely fall for this show! Hey! Next time when you're in Korea, remember to experience this special drama culture!

strIntroduction: Experience the life of trainees of Korean entertainment agencies. If you like K-pop and want to know all the news, you mustn't miss this best chance!! strIntroduction: Never say you've been to Korea, if you didn't visited Seoul tower! Namsan Seoul Tower is one of the famous landmarks in Korea, where you can enjoy different views of Seoul. Here is also famous for using love-locker with your lover and friends to keep memory of this trip forever!

strIntroduction: Since there's more and more flights to Daegu, it has become a new place to go in Korea. However, do yo know where to go in this mysterious city? We'll not only show you the 1300-year old Tongdosa Temple, but take you to the coolest festival, Chimac Festival! Hey, no more hesitation! Come and pay a visit to Daegu!

strIntroduction: Traveling alone and having no idea where to go next? As long as you've come to Busan, you must not skip the harbor view! The local tour bus is surely your best choice! With tour guiding by local Busan residents, you can have a deeper understanding of this city!

strIntroduction: Being one of the shooting scenes in Korean drama, "My Love from the Star" and a well-known spot in Seoul, Hangang River is absolutely a place you can never say you've been to Seoul without visiting it! Not only can you soak in the romantic drama mood, but fall for the gorgeous scenery of Seoul here. Don't forget to schedule this spot into your next trip in Korea!
strTitle: Hangang River Ferry Cruise

strIntroduction: Welcome to Everland, a magical world of adventures and excitement where Everlanders dreams come true. Set in lush hillsides 40km south of Seoul, this mammoth amusement park is regarded as one of Korea's best.

strIntroduction: Finally!!!! We can get rid of annoying traffics! In stead of saving your time, the Incheon-Seoul Express Train is way too convenient that you just need to transfer inside the airport! (Secret time: Seoul station is the only place where you can check-in previously!)

strIntroduction: Have you imagined yourself with a kpop-star makeup? We'll send professional Korean stylists to your place to put on makeup for you! It'll definitely be a marvelous experience!

strIntroduction: Have you ever heard a province in Korea named Gyeonggi do? strIntroduction: As known as one of the successful Korean dramas, Descendants of the Sun has drew a huge attention among the world! Are u also a fan of Song-Song couple? If the answer is yes, you must not let this opportunity slip away! Come and visit the "Uruk" with us!

strIntroduction: There are various exotic attractions here in Paju, one of classic filming locations of Korean dramas. strIntroduction: Besides NANTA, BIBAP, and the painters: HERO, here's a new show for you to enjoy in Seoul. Narrating the inspiring story of a crowd who determine to become firemen, FIREMAN offers us a 75-minute nonstop tense and impressive performance!

strIntroduction: Do you want to enjoy amazing blossom scenes? Then, you can never miss fairytale Edelweiss Swiss theme park and the Garden of Morning Calm!

strIntroduction: To enjoy the color of autumn foliage, you can never miss Naejangsan! With 760 kinds of local plants, designated natural monuments, and various wild animals living inside, Naejangsan attracts people from all over the world to appreciate its wonders of scenes!

strIntroduction: Enjoy unlimited ultra high-speed date connection at so cheap price!you don't need to carry on the wifi egg,the easiest way to share your amazing travel with friends!

strIntroduction: Known as one of the summertime must-go places, Jeju Island not only has significant scenery on land but breeds abundance of living creatures under the sea. Wanna spend time with those adorable creatures and enjoy the view below sea level? Having a snorkeling experience with a professional instructor will surely satisfied you!
strTitle: You Only Live Once: Snorkeling in Jeju Island, South Korea

strIntroduction: If you want to experience the romantic sight of Busan, you can never miss Gadeok Island. Following the steps of locals, you can realize the secret of Busan. Each corner is really worth photographing!

strIntroduction: This tour is certified by the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism as an Excellent Travel Product.Never miss the best adventure in Jeju!

strIntroduction: 內藏山名字取自於「山中藏有山」之意。每到秋天遊客總絡繹不絕，古刹内藏寺與周圍染紅的楓葉海相映成趣，深受國內外遊客的喜愛，絕對是韓國賞楓首選！
strTitle: 【韓國賞楓超值首選】全羅道內藏山一日遊（含登山纜車）

strIntroduction: A day trip visiting cultures of Korea, Jeonju Hanok Village and relaxing yourself at Jinan Red Ginseng Spa. Besides soaking in the spa with red ginseng and oriental medicinal herbs to release pressure, you are also able to embrace the scene of Maisan Mt. during your spa time.
strTitle: Luxury SPA experience with red ginseng in Korea

strIntroduction: Besides visiting one of the must go sightseeing spots in Korea, The Garden of Morning Calm, you'll enjoy a cup of coffee at Santorini Café with amazing scene surrounded. Last but not least, an exciting ATV experience is also contained in this one-day tour!

strIntroduction: Come and enjoy the localest tour with KKday! Besides showing you the world hertiage, Seongsan Ilchulbong Peak, this full-day bus tour will also bring you to Sangumburi Crater and Woman Diver Show.

strIntroduction: Wanna be a time traveler going back to the old times of Korea? Although time travel may sounds ridiculous, GoGuan can to some extent meet your requirements! With various kinds of figure clothing, GoGuan offers you an opportunity to act as if you were a well-known noble then!
strTitle: GoGuan Korean Hanbok experience in Hongdae

strIntroduction: Looking for a Hanbok experience at various landmarks in Seoul? Here we offer an outdoor hanbok experience which is more special than any other! Come and put this gorgeous clothes on to create a wonderful memory in Seoul!
strTitle: 1-day special Hanbok experience in Seoul

strIntroduction: Adorable hop-on hop-off bus is the most popular transportation to travel with in Busan recently! Among this loop tour, we'll pass through many popular scenic spots. Let's leave our footprints from Oryukdo to the top of Hwangryeongsan Mt.!

strIntroduction: Summertime only! Besides following us to have an adventure in the Pig Museum and enjoy cuisines at the top ten restaurants in Gyeonggi do, you'll also pay a visit to the first premium designer outlet in Korea. What's more, you can have a glass of fresh grape juice and a box of grapes after the tour!
strTitle: Experience in Grapes Farm+Little Piggy Museum+Yeoju Premium Outlets one-day tour

strIntroduction: Take yourself on a higher and more exciting adventure with Gyeonggi paragliding experience. Soar above 520 meters in the sky and be amazed by the beautiful senery of the Yongjin city.
strTitle: I belive I can fly! The fascinating paragliding in Yongin city, Gyeonggi.

strIntroduction: Do you wanna try something cool and fun in this busy city, Seoul? Viewed as the latest outdoor activity among the world, standup paddleboarding not only provides you an exciting experience, but let you enjoy the scenery on Han River simultaneously!
strTitle: SUP standup paddleboarding experience on Han River

strIntroduction: Both voice and data with your own phone at affordable prices.Access to internet anywhere in Korea using Korea’s best quality mobile network.
strTitle: Korea EG Sim Card

strIntroduction: Come and enjoy the localest tour with KKday! Besides showing you Hallim Park, Suweolbong, and Spirited Garden, this full-day bus tour will also bring you to Teddy Bear Museum and take you to the traditional Korean-style Buffet!
strTitle: Western Jeju Daily Bus Tour

strIntroduction: Jeju Golden Bus City Tourprovides an opportunity to take a one-stop tour of the beautiful Jejudo.Unlimited transfers with Day Pass！！
strTitle: jeju golden bus city tour

strIntroduction: Are you the man who love exciting activities? If the answer is "yes", make sure that you don't miss the water coaster "JET-BOAT KK7800 boats"! Remember to have your first jet ride at The Bay 101 when you visit Busan next time!
strTitle: [Enjoy the speed!] Busan The Bay101 jet boat ticket

strIntroduction: Do you remember the squirrel Sandy in sponge Bob who wears an oxygen mask and walks in the sea? You can also become a seawalker now in Jeju island!
strTitle: Jeju Seawalker Experience

strIntroduction: There's no need for understanding Korean to enjoy in this show! The Look offers not only a nonverbal performance, but a show with interaction between performers and audience. Wanna enjoy some new things in Seoul? The Look will surely satisfy you!
strTitle: Seoul Original Drawing Show "The Look" tickets

strIntroduction: The City Tour bus, which is one of the special features in Seoul, will take you to plenty popular place in the downtown of Seou. With this course in Seoul, you can visit most of the must-go attractions in Seoul!
strTitle: Seoul City Sightseeing Bus Tour ticket

strIntroduction: Known as one of the summertime must-go places, Jeju Island not only has significant scenery on land but breeds abundance of living creatures under the sea. Wanna spend time with those adorable creatures and enjoy the view below sea level? Having a diving experience with a professional instructor will surely satisfied you!
strTitle: You Only Live Once: Diving Tour in Jeju Island, South Korea

strIntroduction: 還在煩惱今年秋天應該到哪賞楓嗎？KKday專門為楓葉愛好者設計了精彩的二日遊，帶你遊遍韓國各大賞楓聖地！快跟著我們一起出發內藏山、白羊寺及馬耳山，欣賞絕美的楓葉吧！
strLocation: Korea, Gyeonggi, Seoul, Jeonbuk, Jeonnam, Jeonju
strTitle: Korea Autumn Maple Tour, Naejangsan Mt., Maisan Mt. and Baegyangsa two-day trip

strIntroduction: Adorable hop-on hop-off bus is the most popular transportation to travel with in Busan recently! Among this loop tour, we'll pass through many popular scenic spots. Let's leave our footprints from Haedong Yonggungsa Temple, a beautiful temple over the sea, to Songjeong beach having dense pine forest!
strTitle: 【Busan HOT!】Busan City Tour Bus - Blue Line(HaedongYonggungsa Direction)

strIntroduction: Constituted of 8 new-open halls, Sea Life Busan Aquarium not only raises over 250 species of marine lives, but provides various kinds of experience, such as feeding show and glass bottom boat! You must not miss this well-known attraction in Busan when you pay a visit to this wonderful place!
strTitle: Must visit Busan Attraction, Sea Life Busan Aquarium

strIntroduction: Have you ever heard of these two well-known filming spots in Korea, Nami Island and Petite France? As popular attrcactions, they're always full of tourists. But now, you can explore the beauty of Nami Island and experience the exotic atmosphere in Petite France within a day! There's no more hesitation, come and join in our tour immediately!
strTitle: Let's visit Petite France and Nami Island in a lovely day trip

strIntroduction: Wanna be a time traveler going back to the old times of Korea? Although time travel may sounds ridiculous, GoGuan can to some extent meet your requirements! With various kinds of figure clothing, GoGuan offers you an opportunity to act as if you were a well-known noble then!
strTitle: GoGuan Korean Hanbok experience in Myeongdong

strIntroduction: Have you ever heard of "semi-submarine"? Different from the normal one, semi-submarine only submerges part of itself in the sea, and owing to submerging half of the vessel in the water, you can enjoy both scenery on land and in the sea!
strTitle: Enjoy The Bay 101 Semi-submarine in Busan

strIntroduction: The sauna with the highest popularity in Myeongdong, Hwanggeum Sauna provides you various kinds of spa with sophisticated facilities. Believe it or not, you can not only take a rest and refresh yourself, but getting prettier after the heat!
strTitle: Hwanggeum Sauna, the traditional sauna in Myeongdong
